   19: %%
   20: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   21: %% File: cover_SUITE.erl
   22: %%
   23: %% Description:
   24: %%    This file contains the test cases for the code coverage support
   25: %%
   26: %% Test  of code coverage support in common_test
   27: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: -module(cover_SUITE).
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: 
   32: -compile(export_all).
   33: 
   34: %% Default timetrap timeout (set in init_per_testcase).
   35: -define(default_timeout, test_server:minutes(1)).
   36: 
   37: suite() ->
   38:     [].
   39: 
   40: all() ->
   41:     [].
   42: 
   43: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   44:     Config.
   45: 
   46: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   47:     Config.
   48: 
   49: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   50:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(?default_timeout),
   51:     [{watchdog, Dog}|Config].
   52: 
   53: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   54:     try apply(?MODULE,Case,[cleanup,Config])
   55:     catch error:undef -> ok
   56:     end,
   57: 
   58:     Dog=?config(watchdog, Config),
   59:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog),
   60:     ok.
   61: 
   62: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   63: %%% Test cases
   64: break(_Config) ->
   65:     test_server:break(""),
   66:     ok.
   67: 
   68: default(_Config) ->
   69:     cover_compiled = code:which(cover_test_mod),
   70:     cover_test_mod:foo(),
   71:     ok.
   72: 
   73: default_no_cover(_Config) ->
   74:     cover_test_mod:foo(),
   75:     ok.
   76: 
   77: slave(_Config) ->
   78:     cover_compiled = code:which(cover_test_mod),
   79:     cover_test_mod:foo(),
   80:     N1 = nodename(slave,1),
   81:     {ok,Node} = start_slave(N1),
   82:     cover_compiled = rpc:call(Node,code,which,[cover_test_mod]),
   83:     rpc:call(Node,cover_test_mod,foo,[]),
   84:     {ok,Node} = ct_slave:stop(N1),
   85:     ok.
   86: slave(cleanup,_Config) ->
   87:     kill_slaves([nodename(slave,1)]).
   88: 
   89: slave_start_slave(_Config) ->
   90:     cover_compiled = code:which(cover_test_mod),
   91:     cover_test_mod:foo(),
   92:     N1 = nodename(slave_start_slave,1),
   93:     N2 = nodename(slave_start_slave,2),
   94:     {ok,Node} = start_slave(N1),
   95:     cover_compiled = rpc:call(Node,code,which,[cover_test_mod]),
   96:     rpc:call(Node,cover_test_mod,foo,[]),
   97:     {ok,Node2} = start_slave(Node,N2), % start slave N2 from node Node
   98:     rpc:call(Node2,cover_test_mod,foo,[]),
   99:     {ok,Node2} = rpc:call(Node,ct_slave,stop,[N2]),
  100:     {ok,Node} = ct_slave:stop(N1),
  101:     ok.
  102: slave_start_slave(cleanup,_Config) ->
  103:     kill_slaves([nodename(slave_start_slave,1),
  104: 		 nodename(slave_start_slave,2)]).
  105: 
  106: cover_node_option(_Config) ->
  107:     cover_compiled = code:which(cover_test_mod),
  108:     cover_test_mod:foo(),
  109:     Node = fullname(existing_node_1),
  110:     cover_compiled = rpc:call(Node,code,which,[cover_test_mod]),
  111:     rpc:call(Node,cover_test_mod,foo,[]),
  112:     ok.
  113: 
  114: ct_cover_add_remove_nodes(_Config) ->
  115:     cover_compiled = code:which(cover_test_mod),
  116:     cover_test_mod:foo(),
  117:     Node = fullname(existing_node_2),
  118:     Beam = rpc:call(Node,code,which,[cover_test_mod]),
  119:     false = (Beam == cover_compiled),
  120: 
  121:     rpc:call(Node,cover_test_mod,foo,[]), % should not be collected
  122:     {ok,[Node]} = ct_cover:add_nodes([Node]),
  123:     cover_compiled = rpc:call(Node,code,which,[cover_test_mod]),
  124:     rpc:call(Node,cover_test_mod,foo,[]), % should be collected
  125:     ok = ct_cover:remove_nodes([Node]),
  126:     rpc:call(Node,cover_test_mod,foo,[]), % should not be collected
  127: 
  128:     Beam = rpc:call(Node,code,which,[cover_test_mod]),
  129: 
  130:     ok.
  131: 
  132: otp_9956(Config) ->
  133:     cover_compiled = code:which(?MODULE),
  134:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir,Config),
  135:     absolute = filename:pathtype(DataDir),
  136:     true = filelib:is_dir(DataDir),
  137:     ok.
  138: 
  139: 
  140: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  141: %%% Internal
  142: nodename(Case,N) ->
  143:     list_to_atom(nodeprefix(Case) ++ integer_to_list(N)).
  144: 
  145: nodeprefix(Case) ->
  146:     atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ "_" ++ atom_to_list(Case) ++ "_node".
  147: 
  148: 
  149: fullname(Name) ->
  150:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
  151:     list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Name) ++ "@" ++ Host).
  152: 
  153: kill_slaves([Name|Names]) ->
  154:     _ = rpc:call(fullname(Name),erlang,halt,[]),
  155:     kill_slaves(Names);
  156: kill_slaves([]) ->
  157:     ok.
  158: 
  159: start_slave(Name) ->
  160:     start_slave(node(),Name).
  161: 
  162: start_slave(FromNode,Name) ->
  163:     {ok, HostStr}=inet:gethostname(),
  164:     Host = list_to_atom(HostStr),
  165:     rpc:call(FromNode,ct_slave,start,
  166: 	     [Host,Name,
  167: 	      [{boot_timeout,15}, % extending some timers for slow test hosts
  168: 	       {init_timeout,15},
  169: 	       {startup_timeout,15}]]).
